title: Ticket #4190: Our file transfer plugins should support output URLs
description:
Jobs can specify supply a URL for output files. Our curl plugin should support that usage, at least for the file type.

The plugin can check which argument looks like a URL and do an input or output transfer as appropriate.
remarks:
2014-Apr-11 16:45:26 by zmiller:
CODE REVIEW: Overall looks fine. Currently HTCondor assumes two slashes are part of the URL, so you could add that to the "file:" test.
attachments:
• plugin.patch 2485 bytes added by jfrey on 2014-Feb-03 22:39:59 UTC.
    Patch to support output URLs in the curl plugin.
